body.name: SKYDUE Clipboard Binder with Refill Papers, Clipboard Folder Includes 5 Dividers with 10 Pockets, Labels, Loose Leaf Paper, 3 Ring Binder 1 Inch for School Office (Fit Letter Sized Paper)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: Powerful Organizer: SKYDUE 3 ring binder includes two interior pockets, 5 plastic colored file dividers with 10 pockets that fit letter-sized papers, 28pcs 3 ring loose leaf paper, a pen loop that can easily hold the pen, and 14 labels for orderly classification.

Premium Material: The 3 ring binder's inner core is crafted from sturdy cardboard. Its exterior features a transparent overlay, rendering the binder waterproof, durable, and lightweight. Also, the metal clip provides a firmer grip, and the elastic band closes the binder easily.

Multifunction: SKYDUE 3 ring binder 1 inch comes equipped with metal clip, folders, and storage pockets. This ingenious combination merges the functionality of a binder and a clipboard. So, it can be used as a nursing clipboard with storage, a teacher clipboard folio, or a student notebook folder.

Easy to carry: The letter-sized clipboard binder is smaller, lighter, and more convenient to carry compared to an A4-sized binder. Its dimensions fit most bags, be it school backpacks or professional briefcases.

Perfect Gift Idea: SKYDUE binder with the clipboard is an essential school office supply, you can give it to your friends, children, parents, and lovers as Christmas, birthday, thanksgiving, or New Year's perfect gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Organizer As Folder This binder organizer includes five sturdy dividers, each equipped with two pockets, allowing for comprehensive document categorization and storage. As Binder The 3-ring binder securely holds your documents in place. With a 1-inch capacity, it accommodates a substantial volume of papers. As Clipboard This multifunctional binder is equipped with a sturdy clipboard, offering both document storage and a functional writing platform.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great binder at a great price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice binder. The colors are muted in tone and very pleasing. The construction and materials are of excellent quality. The clipboard provides ample support to write without the binder needing to be completely full. The rings are strong, aligned well, and have opening tabs that make opening easy. The included dividers and binder pockets are of decent quality. The front and rear binder pockets offer sufficient flex without being weak. The pen holder is thoughtfully placed to the outside of the securing strap ribbon rivets. My only issue with this binder is the sharpness of the edging. I will likely cover the edges with a coordinating color or clear tape to smooth out the edges. Overall, this is a well-built and thoughtfully designed organizer at a very good price and I definitely would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this padfolio style binder
reviews.reviewText: I have a couple of padfolios and have often wanted one that had a binder feature like this one does and I was super happy to see this come up for review. I am a tournament Scrabble player and am using this binder to hold all of my study materials and word lists as I switch over to Collins from NWL (for those not familiar with word nerd speak, I am learning a new lexicon).The envelopes and loose-leaf paper are all good quality and stay in place on the binder rings well. The clipboard clamp on the front cover is strong and holds paper in place well.I use the clipboard to hold my score sheets while playing practice games with my partner who is also switching to Collins. For the time being, we're playing with access to the cheat sheets and this clipboard/binder is perfect for allowing quick and easy access to my study sheets while playing. When we're almost ready to start doing tournaments in Collins we'll stop using the cheat sheets during play and rely solely on our brains, but we aren't there yet and I love this binder for practice sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Binder and Pretty
reviews.reviewText: This binder is a nice twist on the standard binder. Pretty neutral and design. This binder is about 1 inch and comes with paper and pocket dividers. The clipboard on the front is a nice touch. They also include some sticker tabs in the inside. I wish the pocket folders matched the over all color and design of the binder.Probably going to have to hide this binder when my mom comes to visit because I know she is going to want it. The price is decent. I do like the plastic cover the one thing I would add would be to have the front have a pocket so you can slide things into the cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comprehensive binder system, great for organizing coursework
reviews.reviewText: I am using this binder to organize handouts for some related courses I'm taking. The sturdy dividers are perfect for separating the information for each course. Everything is exactly as described. Each piece is very sturdy and the loose-leaf paper included is smooth. The clipboard on the front is handy for the few handouts I am working on at a time. There are a couple things that could be improved, but it's not enough to remove a star in my opinion:-The waterproof cover is sealed at the edges of the binder. In some places it's a little rough and could possibly snag.-Because the edges are rough in some places, the elastic closure could wear faster. There are no signs of wear as yet; and only time will tell with this.-The pen loop is just a small bit of the same material used to laminate the binder. In my experience, loops like that don't last long before ripping but again, time will tell. Because there is a pouch included in the binder, I'm not too worried about this.Overall this is a complete binder system and seems really durable. I can see it lasting me for many courses throughout the years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well designed binder with many thoughtful details
reviews.reviewText: This binder has many small features.- It's a three ring binder- It has many pockets- It has a clipboard- It comes with colored labels- Has colored dividers to separate sectionsOverall this is the most feature-rich binder I've seen and it's executed well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Self-contained Binder System
reviews.reviewText: I regularly use binders. This is a very nice binder because it comes with everything you need. The outside has a clip board feature, that a paper tablet or document can be attached to allowing the binder to be used for a clipboard. The inside of the binder covers both have clear pockets in them. Included is a small amount of loose leaf paper. There are five colored dividers, all with pockets on both sides. And there are pastel tabs that you can label your dividers with. The pockets can hold generous size document or magazine. The last page is an envelope and you can store any miscellaneous items you have along with your business card. There is an elastic on the back side of the binder that you just loop around the binder to keep it closed. I really like the colors and design of this binder and will be able to use it for multiple tasks at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice notebook with all the bells and whistles! Comes complete with pocket folders, pencil holder, and a nice clear pocket folder in the back with a snap that keeps all your important papers safe! Serves as a clipboard as well...what more can you ask for!?!?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent notebook, beautiful modern updates, durable
reviews.reviewText: This is the best working notebook. It is beautiful with modern updates that maximize it's usefuleness. I am using it to keep multiple tasks and related materials at my fingertips. No more piles of paper. No more filing. Durable cover and pocket construction throughout.I keep my current task list on the clipboard cover, use the quality lined paper for notes, and keep relavent documents together in a tab folder for easy reference when working on a task. You can also add any three-hole punched pages, folders, or accessories to customize it.
